Directions: In a large saucepan, cook beef, onion and green pepper over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain. Add the remaining ingredients; bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) can whole kernel corn, undrained
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed tomato soup, undiluted
